name: Basketball Superstars
description:
Welcome to the unique world of Basketball Superstars!

Put on your jersey and get ready for some heat! Experience the ultimate basketball experience by creating your character, upgrading your skills by trainings and challenge the opponents!

Equip your gear and choose your skills, and ready for the challenge!

Everything is playable without having to pay or purchase anything.

Control your character with joystick and release your finger to shoot, dunk and block!

Get it now and have fun!!
publishers: VIRTUAL PROJECTS TEKNOLOJI OYUN YAZILIM ANONIM SIRKETI
